args:
The Halidom has been mobbed by citizens,
and while the prince wants to persuade them
to stand down, Zena suggests retreat so as to
avoid a conflict. However, Ayaha and Otoha
appear before the party once they're away from
the Halidom and engage them in combat.
All of you must leave at once!\nThe prince is not even in the castle!
You're working for the Other, so you are!\nI won't believe a word you say!
Get the prince out here before we tear\nthis castle down around your heads!
Crush the Other! Peace to Alberia!
Crush the Other! Peace to Alberia!
Hells be damned, this is a fine mess.
I can't even count their number, and they\nall seem to believe you the Other.
Someone must be egging them on\nfrom the shadows!
▷They don't look like they have a leader.◁\nI surmise they are a group which formed\norganically.
Looks like a spontaneous army made'a\ncommon folk with some rogues and\nbandits to fill things out.
Then what Ciella said was true?
I seriously can't believe the rumors\nwould've spread THIS far or fast.
I recognize some of these people;\nthey hail from New Alberia.
What? But why!\nI thought they joined us in New Alberia\nbecause they loved this country!
I know one thing: We're not turning our\nswords on our own people.
I'll just have to go out there and try to\nmake them see reason before things\nget out of hand.
Those people are enraged; to appear\nbefore them right now would only fan\nthe fires of their passion.
No matter how sincerely you speak,\nthey are clearly not of a mind to listen.
Perhaps it may be best for us to make\nourselves scarce for a time.

All right, we'll take a detour. If we circle
around to the rear of the castle, we should
be able to get in touch with the soldiers
who are still trapped inside.
Okay, we should be safe from this\ndistance, so let's—
What a thing, the two of us finding an\nunsightly puppet in a place like this!
It might not be able to do anything without\nbeing told, but it's at least good at hide-\nand-seek. But there's no escaping now!
Shifting to caution mode.\n▷Not these two again!◁
First Ciella, and now the horror twins?\nYou jerks are more persistent than my\ncase'a foot fungus!
Sorry, but we can't fight you now.\nWe're a bit short on time.
We know! You're gonna make a mess of\nthat angry crowd, right?
That does sound like fun, but I wanna play\nwith the little machine puppet!
Yes, this looks MUCH more exciting!

▷Why are you all so damn persistent?!
Can't we just get along already?◁
Mascula, negotiating will not avail us.
Commencing combat preparations.
Fine then. If you won't get out of our way,\nwe'll take you down and continue on.
Hee hee! Let's play lots!\nWe'll rip you to pieces this time!
